extendedInfo.description: Droid Digital Alarm Clock  is a practical application which turns your Android Device into Beautiful Digital Clock, It helps for time management in many ways:- Unlimited Colors Selection for your Clock- Many Gorgeous Fonts- Lots of background for your clock- Multiple Alarms- Multiple Events- Show/Hide seconds- Select your favorite Stick Position for the Clock- Select your song or even playlist as alarm- Snooze ON/OFF with time customizable- Alarm triggers even when the app is not open- Automatically refresh weather conditions in your area- Shake your phone to toggle the flashlight- Option for secret question for stop the alarm:: THEMES ::Elegant and versatile themes with power packed set of options. Droid Digital Alarm Clock supports different light or dark color schemes, custom gorgeous fonts, and different background choices::MANAGE EVENTS::Droid Digital Alarm Clock increases the productivity by outlining and structuring your day, events and meetings in the most efficient way.::WEATHER FORECAST::Droid Digital Alarm Clock integrated Weather forecast functionality automatically and continuously updates the weather conditions of your area. It helps you to plan your daily activities according to the expected weather conditions.:: CUSTOMIZE ALARM CONTROL::Sound â Select the song you want to wake up. Alarm clock offers to create alarm playlist from your music libraryRecurring - You can configure one-time alarm or recurring alarms. You can use the same time settings on consecutive days. It will wake you up repeatedly on set days and times.Flashlight - In Dark, shake your mobile to turn it to flashlight.Wake you up even App is not open- While your app is not open and the time comes to activate your alarm, Droid Digital Alarm Clock will wake you up with your favorite settings.:: Pro APP ::- Download Pro app to enjoy all features.- Download Pro to remove adds.- Get your copy here before price get higher https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.CurioLogix.DAClockProâWhat is new in v2.0.3â - A beautiful app widget to place on screen- Introduced new Interactive and cool Design - A Preview in settings to quickly see your clock- Supporting Mobiles as well as Tablets- Introduced settings to update weather and location on fixed interval or even turn off.- Cool Backgrounds AddedâWhat is new in v2.0.4â-Improved widget-Added widget for tabs -Added widget for landscape tab-Fully Customizable widget-Options to change widget setting from widget-Options to create alarm from widget-Show Alarms icon if there is alarm set.-Show weather on widget-Show temperature-Show your current location.-Multiple colors support -Multiple fonts support-12 and 24 hour support-Show current day and date.Keywords: alarm, alarm clock, clock, timer, countdown, gentle alarm, gentle wake up, wake up,alarm, clock, alarm clock, alarm clock plus, alarm clock plusv2, alarmclock, alarmclockplus, acp, nap, alarms, clocks, alarm clocks, alarm-clock, alarm_clock, alarm.clock, alarm+clock, sleep, snooze ALARM CLOCK

reviews.title: Sucks! Do not download!
reviews.comment: This app sucks. If you set multiple alarms, only one will go off. Also once the alarm does go off, it won\'t turn off because your phone will freeze up. This has happened two days in a row. Do not. Download this app. I know it is free. And I shouldn\'t complain... but this app just sucks entirley.
reviews.author: Ezio Howard

reviews.title: Sucks

reviews.title: Great, but
reviews.comment: I just love this clock.  It does everything I want except turn off.  Repeatedly during the day it restarts itself, and I get a notification.  I have tried killing it, but it just keeps starting.  I had to turn off notification sounds to keep it quiet.  If I don\'t find a solution I will have to uninstall.  Which is a shame...
reviews.author: A Google User
